group_1.narration: We exchanged contact information and@made sure to find time to spend together.
Both of us became comfortable venting@our pent-up frustrations just like that@first time we talked at the shrine.
Wonderful days followed in which we had@someone who could relate to our own plight.
At the same time, however...@The deeper our relationship became...

group_1.textLeft: This is my first time dining on a hamburger.

group_1.textRight: Look, you just peel back the wrapper and@[chara:101901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101901:cheek_0][chara:101901:motion_100][chara:101901:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101901:lipSynch_1]take a bite.

group_1.textLeft: Watching this with my own eyes, it seems@rather barbaric...
What about these slivers of fried potato?

group_1.textRight: You eat them with your hands.

group_1.narration: Tsukasa crossing her legs and@eating with her bare hands looked@so uncivilized to me.

group_1.textRight: Ah! Do you mind if I look around that used@clothing store?

group_1.textLeft: Do you...intend on purchasing clothing worn @by others?

group_1.textRight: Everything gets cleaned really well, so it@doesn't bother me.

group_1.textLeft: (So, what I thought were her own clothes were@someone else's...)

group_1.narration: Tsukasa dressing in a stranger's discarded@attire made me feel as though she paid no@attention to her own appearance.

group_1.textRight: Oh, hey! I've never run into you out here@before!

group_1.textLeft: And who is this?! Don't tell me you're@twins?!
Ts-Tsukasa, physically striking another@person seems a bit...

group_1.narration: Tsukasa's way of interacting with@others felt unrefined and rather violent...
These differences compounded@whenever we saw one another...
Reflecting back on it now,@I was simply a sheltered girl who knew@nothing of how the real world works.
Nevertheless, at the time, I felt that@Tsukasa, the one friend I could open my@heart to, was continuously regressing.
It only served to intensify my misgivings.

group_1.textLeft: Why was it that you and father separated?

group_1.textRight: Why would you ask me that out of the blue?

group_1.textLeft: I happened to learn that the flute he gave@me originated from the Kosho Ward...

group_1.textRight: There were inconsolable differences between@us that couldn't be overlooked.
Love overcoming class and upbringing?@That's just a delusion...
Listen well, Tsukuyo. Find friends and@partners who are like you.
Otherwise, it's nearly impossible to recover@once your feelings get hurt...

group_1.narration: Just as my own concerns with Tsukasa@were building, I began asking questions@about my mother and father...
The answers sliced deep into my being,@and continued to haunt me for some time...
